Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is designed to enhance your daily productivity and streamline your workflow. Given its unique features and the benefits it provides, I believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering its quality and the value it offers, I am offering it to you for $200. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the value we believe it will bring to your life. I hope you find this offer compelling and look forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
